statements: DELETE FROM quantum_hardware_components WHERE status = 'operational' AND availability = TRUE;
DELETE FROM quantum_hardware_components WHERE component_type = 'Qubit' AND status = 'Active';
DELETE FROM quantum_hardware_components WHERE component_id = 1 AND status = 'Active';
DELETE FROM hardware_availability WHERE availability_id = 100 AND available = TRUE;
DELETE FROM component_location WHERE location_name = 'Lab A';
DELETE FROM component_location WHERE location_name = 'Lab 3B' AND component_id IN (SELECT component_id FROM quantum_hardware_component WHERE availability = TRUE);
DELETE FROM component_availability WHERE component_id = 1 AND available_qty < 10;
DELETE FROM component_locations WHERE location_name = 'Lab A' AND floor_number = 2;
